Akkadian: 𒆥𒋝 (liliātu) Amharic: ሌት (let), ሌሊት (lelit) Arabic: لَيْلَة f (layla), لَيْل (ar) (layl) (collective) Egyptian Arabic: ليل m (lēl), ليلة f (lēla) Hijazi Arabic: ليلة f (lēla), ليل m (lēl) Assyrian Neo-Aramaic: ܠܲܝܠܹܐ m (layle) Classical Syriac: ܠܠܝܐ m (lilyā’) Hebrew: לליא m (lilyā’)
